Detailed Description

This file declares useful functions and types for the VISHNU add update and delte commands.

Author:
Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr<Options> makeMachineOptions ( std::string  pgName,
StringcallBackType &  fName,
std::string &  dietConfig,
StringcallBackType &  fSite,
StringcallBackType &  fLanguage,
std::string &  sshPublicKeyPath,
StringcallBackType &  fMachineDescription,
int  type = 0 
)

To build options for the VISHNU machine commands.

Parameters:
pgName : The name of the command
fName : The machine name option callback
dietConfig : Represents the VISHNU config file
fSite : The site name option callback
fLanguage : The language option callback
sshPublicKeyPath : The user ssh key path option
fMachineDescription : The machine description option callback
type : Indicates if it is an add or an update command, 0 means update, and 1 means add
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
